        from datetime import datetime, timedelta

        start_date = datetime(2017, 7, 8, 0, 0, 0)
        pattern = [13.068, 12.143, 11.809, 11.822, 11.246, 11.246, 10.603, 7.114, 4.307, -0.127, -0.569, -4.642, -7.020, -5.218, -4.548, 1.440, 3.523, 4.923, 6.544, 9.190, 12.418, 12.056, 12.619, 12.144]

        for i in range(96):

            # Format the date as string: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
            date_str = current_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
            value = pattern[i % 24]
            # Format value to 3 decimal places
            value_str = format(value, '.3f')
            print(f"{date_str} {value_str}")
